A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A very surprising turn for the franchise\, and a very divisive one\, nonetheless\, Star Wars: the Last Jedi does its best to break free of the shadow of the original trilogy and become its own thing\, and it does so successfully. While many may mourn the way the original characters are sidelined in favor of this new generation\, there is no denying that Star Wars is treading new waters here\, and supplying fans with many new twists and turns\, along with more layered storytelling and fleshed out characters.
